name: Hoth: Echo Command Center (War Room) (V)
LocationDStext: Unless you occupy this site (or three related locations), The First Transport Is Away! is immune to Our First Catch Of The Day.
LocationLStext: If Local Uprising on table, may use 1 Force to take Rendezvous Point into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Your transports are hyperspeed +2. May not be converted.
